edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.fitting

Class DifferentialEvolutionMinimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.fitting.DifferentialEvolutionMinimizer

  • public class DifferentialEvolutionMinimizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the differential evolution algorithm for function minimization.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

      Performs a minimization of a function starting with only parameter bounds; a full population is generated based on these bounds.

    • Method Detail

      • minimizeWithPopulation

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector minimizeWithPopulation(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix population,
                                                                ObjectiveFunction f,
                                                                org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector parameterLowerBounds,
                                                                org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector parameterUpperBounds,
                                                                int populationSize,
                                                                double scaleFactor,
                                                                int maxIterations,
                                                                double crossoverFrequency,
                                                                double tol)
        Performs a minimization of a function starting with a given population.
        Parameters:
        population - The population of parameters to start from, one population entry per row, one parameter per column.
        f - The function to be minimized.
        parameterLowerBounds - The lower bounds of each parameter. This must have the same size as the column dimension of the population. Generated parameter values less than these values will be discarded.
        parameterUpperBounds - The upper bounds of each paraemter. This must have the same size as the column dimension of the population. Generated parameter values greater than these values will be discarded.
        populationSize - The size of the population of parameters sets. This must be equal to the row dimension of the population.
        scaleFactor - Factor controlling the scale of crossed over entries during crossover events.
        maxIterations - The maximum number of iterations to allow before returning a result.
        crossoverFrequency - The frequency of crossover from 0 to 1. At any given parameter, this is the probability of initiating a crossover as well as the probability of ending one after it has started.
        tol - Relative function value tolerance controlling termination; if the maximal and minimal population values differ by less than this factor times the maximal value, optimization will terminate.
        Returns:
        The parameter values at the minimal function value found.

      • minimizeWithInitial

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector minimizeWithInitial(ObjectiveFunction f,
                                                             org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector parameterLowerBounds,
                                                             org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector parameterUpperBounds,
                                                             int populationSize,
                                                             double scaleFactor,
                                                             int maxIterations,
                                                             double crossoverFrequency,
                                                             double tol,
                                                             org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector initialGuess)
        Performs a minimization of a function starting with an single initial guess; a full population is generated based on this guess and the parameter bounds.
        Parameters:
        f - The function to be minimized.
        parameterLowerBounds - The lower bounds of each parameter. Generated parameter values less than these values will be discarded.
        parameterUpperBounds - The upper bounds of each parameter. Generated parameter values greater than these values will be discarded.
        populationSize - The size of the population of parameters sets to use for optimization.
        scaleFactor - Factor controlling the scale of crossed over entries during crossover events.
        maxIterations - The maximum number of iterations to allow before returning a result.
        crossoverFrequency - The frequency of crossover from 0 to 1. At any given parameter, this is the probability of initiating a crossover as well as the probability of ending one after it has started.
        tol - Relative function value tolerance controlling termination; if the maximal and minimal population values differ by less than this factor times the maximal value, optimization will terminate.
        initialGuess - A guess at the value of each parameter at the optimum.
        Returns:
        The parameter values at the minimal function value found.

      • minimize

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector minimize(ObjectiveFunction f,
                                                  org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector parameterLowerBounds,
                                                  org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector parameterUpperBounds,
                                                  int populationSize,
                                                  double scaleFactor,
                                                  int maxIterations,
                                                  double crossoverFrequency,
                                                  double tol)
        Performs a minimization of a function starting with only parameter bounds; a full population is generated based on these bounds.
        Parameters:
        f - The function to be minimized.
        parameterLowerBounds - The lower bounds of each parameter. Generated parameter values less than these values will be discarded.
        parameterUpperBounds - The upper bounds of each parameter. Generated parameter values greater than these values will be discarded.
        populationSize - The size of the population of parameters sets to use for optimization.
        scaleFactor - Factor controlling the scale of crossed over entries during crossover events.
        maxIterations - The maximum number of iterations to allow before returning a result.
        crossoverFrequency - The frequency of crossover from 0 to 1. At any given parameter, this is the probability of initiating a crossover as well as the probability of ending one after it has started.
        tol - Relative function value tolerance controlling termination; if the maximal and minimal population values differ by less than this factor times the maximal value, optimization will terminate.
        Returns:
        The parameter values at the minimal function value found.
